statements: SELECT * FROM wallet_addresses;
SELECT bitcoin_address, ethereum_address FROM wallet_addresses WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, cardano_address FROM wallet_addresses WHERE user_id > 10;
SELECT * FROM wallet_addresses WHERE bitcoin_address LIKE '1%' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, bitcoin_address, ethereum_address, cardano_address FROM wallet_addresses ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM wallet_addresses WHERE bitcoin_address = 'xyz123' AND ethereum_address = 'abc456' AND cardano_address = 'def789';
SELECT user_id, bitcoin_address FROM wallet_addresses WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT user_id, ethereum_address FROM wallet_addresses WHERE user_id > 500 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM wallet_addresses WHERE bitcoin_address LIKE '%123%' OR ethereum_address LIKE '%456%' OR cardano_address LIKE '%789%';
SELECT user_id, bitcoin_address, ethereum_address, cardano_address FROM wallet_addresses ORDER BY bitcoin_address ASC, ethereum_address DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_wallets WHERE user_id = 'a1b2c3';
SELECT wallet_address FROM user_wallets WHERE currency = 'BTC';
SELECT user_id, currency FROM user_wallets ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM crypto_currencies WHERE symbol = 'ETH';
SELECT currency_name, symbol, decimals FROM crypto_currencies ORDER BY currency_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_wallets WHERE currency='BTC';
SELECT user_id, currency, wallet_address FROM user_wallets WHERE user_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT wallet_address, user_id FROM user_wallets WHERE currency='ETH' ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT currency FROM user_wallets WHERE user_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT currency_name, symbol, decimals FROM crypto_currencies WHERE currency_name LIKE '%coin%' ORDER BY symbol ASC;
SELECT * FROM user_wallets;
SELECT user_id, currency FROM user_wallets WHERE currency = 'Bitcoin';
SELECT user_id, address FROM user_wallets WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrencies ORDER BY currency_id DESC;
SELECT currency_name, symbol FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE symbol = 'BTC';
SELECT * FROM user_wallets WHERE currency = 'Bitcoin';
SELECT user_id, currency FROM user_wallets WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT users.username, user_wallets.address FROM users JOIN user_wallets ON users.user_id = user_wallets.user_id WHERE users.email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT user_wallets.address, cryptocurrencies.currency_name FROM user_wallets JOIN cryptocurrencies ON user_wallets.currency = cryptocurrencies.symbol WHERE cryptocurrencies.currency_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(address) AS num_addresses FROM user_wallets GROUP BY user_id HAVING num_addresses > 1;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name FROM users WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT currency_name, symbol FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE currency_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT user_id, address, currency FROM wallet_addresses WHERE user_id = 2001 ORDER BY currency DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_wallets WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY user_id ASC, currency_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM wallet_addresses WHERE user_id = 100;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 200;
SELECT currency_name, symbol FROM cryptocurrencies ORDER BY currency_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, wallet_id, currency_id, balance FROM user_wallets WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT * FROM wallet_addresses JOIN users ON wallet_addresses.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT * FROM user_wallets;
SELECT user_id, cryptocurrency, wallet_address FROM user_wallets ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, cryptocurrency, wallet_address FROM user_wallets WHERE user_id = 1001;
SELECT user_id, MAX(balance) AS max_balance FROM ethereum_wallet GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, litecoin_address, balance FROM litecoin_wallet WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC;
SELECT user_id, cryptocurrency, wallet_address FROM user_wallets WHERE user_id = 1
SELECT * FROM bitcoin_wallet WHERE balance > 1000 ORDER BY balance DESC
SELECT user_id, ethereum_address, balance FROM ethereum_wallet WHERE balance < 500 AND user_id = 3 ORDER BY balance ASC
SELECT user_id, ripple_address, balance FROM ripple_wallet WHERE balance BETWEEN 200 AND 500
SELECT * FROM litecoin_wallet WHERE user_id = 2
